mapper.select:
select o.*, p.product_name, m.last_name || m.first_name as member_name,m.phone , s.status from tb_order o join member m on (o.member_no = m.member_no) join product p on (o.product_no = p.product_no) join order_status s on(o.order_status_no = s.order_status_no) join order_info i on(i.order_no = o.order_no)
s.status = #{order_status}
and
o.order_date >= to_date(#{start_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
o.order_date <= to_date(#{end_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
o.order_date > to_date(#{start_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and o.order_date <= to_date(#{end_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1
and ${field} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by o.order_no desc

select count(*) from tb_order o join member m on (o.member_no = m.member_no) join product p on (o.product_no = p.product_no) join order_status s on(o.order_status_no = s.order_status_no)
s.status = #{order_status}
select * from order_status order by order_status_no
